name: Through The Dark (SomeBoringNerd)
description:
The game is currently in the "prototype" state, i'm slowly but surely build the core of the game.

The "alpha" state will be the state where I'll start to make assets, write story, etc... 

The "debug" state is where I'm looking for any glitch, plothole, etc... to fix it

And finaly, the "Release" state, the game is ready to be release publicly, every assets are done, the story is implemented, and the game is playtested entirely.

This is a simple roadmap, and will be more detailed in the future.

if you want to know more about it, feel free to join my discord at this link
